Apple iPhone 4S 16GB - Good Condition Black Sprint Smartphone

Carrier: Sprint Color: Black Jailbroken/Rooted: No
Functional Condition: Working
Cosmetic Condition

We use stock photos. For an accurate representation of the condition of the item in this listing, please reference the condition tab.

This device has been inspected and restored to factory settings. The ESN has been checked and is clear. This phone will only work with Sprint service and can be activated with an existing contract.

            This device runs iOperating System. iOS is an innovative, application-oriented mobile operating system that allows access to iTunes, the most expansive content ecosystem available to mobile devices. Navigate smoothly through hundreds of thousands of available games, programs, and other media with multi-touch gesture support. So many options, all at your fingertips. The iPhone owner is never bored.

 The iPhone 4S is perfect for a casual smartphone user or someone looking for a quality replacement device.
            
            
        

		



Item Description







	

    

    	

        

        

        

        

        

        

        

        

        

        

        

        

        

        

        
Be sure to check out the:
  • Capacitive Touchscreen 
  • "Siri" Digital Personal Assistant 
  • 8.0 Megapixel Rear Camera 
  • USB Connectivity 
  • Huge Selection of Apps

  • Bluetooth 
  • GPS Functionality

    

    

    

    	Your Gazelle package will include:
        

NO ACCESSORIES

        

        

        

        

        

        

        

        


This device will arrive in Gazelle packaging and WITHOUT original accessories. It has an internal, nonremovable battery. Gazelle  does not  provide a SIM or SD card for use with this or any device. 
Any accessories included with this device are compatible and functional, but they may be aftermarket or generic versions. The accessories pictured in our stock listing images are representative of what will be included; however, the actual included accessories may differ slightly in appearance.

Good Condition

This item is previously used and will show signs of wear and tear from normal use. Items in good condition may have flaws such as scratches, scuffs, or nicks on the screen or housing. 

Generally, items in good condition make acceptable replacement devices, but should only be given as gifts to undiscerning recipients.

For Buy-It-Now items:
 Buy-It-Now items require Immediate Payment. You must submit payment via PayPal before you are considered the winner of the item. Please make sure that your shipping and payment information are correct before submitting.

 For auctions/best offers:
 Payment is due within seven (7) days of the auction's end. 

 Sales Tax: State Sales Tax will apply to all items shipped to Massachusetts, Florida, Kentucky, Washington, and Texas as required by law.

 We only accept offers on items that have "best offer" buttons. . 

 Shipping: 

 Shipments are processed within 1 day, Monday-Friday. Your shipment may arrive by FedEx or USPS, but unfortunately we aren't able to offer an option during checkout. High value orders may require a signature upon delivery. Please use a shipping address where you are able to receive deliveries during business hours.
 We have warehouses in multiple locations. Orders of more than one item may arrive in multiple packages and at different times. Tracking for all packages will be provided. 
     
  • Standard free shipping is delivered 1-7 days after leaving our warehouse. 
  • Expedited shipping is delivered 2 business days after leaving our warehouse. 
  • Overnight shipping is delivered the next business day after leaving our warehouse. 
 
 We take great care packaging our items in sturdy cardboard boxes, but if your item arrives damaged please hold the item and packaging and contact us immediately. All shipping claims must be approved by the shipping carrier before a refund can be issued. We will only ship to the address that appears on your receipt, so please make sure this is correct before completing your purchase. We are unable to make changes to your order once the shipment has been processed in our warehouse. If your shipment is refused or otherwise returned to us as undeliverable, we will issue a refund minus the shipping cost.

  • Condition
  • Payments & Shipping
  • Terms
  • Returns
We warranty and represent that the goods are as described in the above listing. We pride ourselves on our customer service. In the rare event that you have a problem with your item please contact us and we'll be happy to help.

 Our 30 day return period commences on the delivery date as reported by the shipping carrier. If free return shipping applies to a purchase, it is only valid within the 50 United States based on the original delivery address and is provided via FedEx. The cost of any return without an RMA and without using the supplied FedEx label is the responsibility of the buyer. An additional warranty is available for purchase through SquareTrade on most items. Gazelle does not provide support on these extended warranties, and all coverage applies as described by Squaretrade's policies.

Consumables such as batteries have a limited lifespan and may not function in a like-new manner. Please be aware that some devices require service, contracts or data plans which are not included in the purchase price. 

 Gazelle regularly adjusts prices based on a variety of factors including market conditions and individual item condition and therefore does not price match other sellers and does not provide price adjustments once a payment is complete. 

 International shipments may incur additional VAT or brokerage fees which are the responsibility of the buyer.

 If you are not satisfied with your purchase, we are here to help! Just contact us within 30 days for return instructions. We provide free return shipping within the 50 United States!

 Please allow 5 working days to process a refund once we receive the return. Since our products often have unique conditions and accessories, we are not able to send replacements. Please review all product details and sale terms before making a purchase.
